string-array.name: scale_desc
string-array.item: The COWS scale is the withdrawal severity rating system typically used to measure Opioid withdrawal symptoms.
The CIWS scale is the withdrawal severity rating system typically used to measure Alcohol withdrawal symptoms.

string-array.name: scale_details
string-array.item: To assess the severity of symptoms clinicians typically use the Clinical Opiate Withdrawal Scale, COWS for short. Use our COWS scale below to test the severity of your withdrawals.
The Clinical Institute Withdrawal Assessment for Alcohol, commonly abbreviated as CIWA or CIWA-Ar (revised version), is a ten item scale used in the assessment and management of alcohol withdrawal.
